citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:57am on 06-Oct-
21.
Inspector contacted licensee by phone and was informed that he was out of town and unavailable for inspection at that
time.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST
Andrew Jones, Assistant DirectorEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:57am on 06-Oct-
21. 
 
Inspector contacted licensee by phone and was informed that he was out of town and unavailable for inspection at that 
time.
